data.name: EnhancedCustomShapeHandle
desc: This service may be represented by a com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue [].

properties.name: MirroredX
desc: Specifies if the x position of the handle is mirrored.

properties.name: MirroredY
desc: Specifies if the y position of the handle is mirrored.

properties.name: Polar
desc: If this attribute is set, the handle is a polar handle.
The property specifies the center position of the handle. If this attribute is set, the attributes RangeX and RangeY are ignored, instead the attribute RadiusRange is used.

properties.name: Position
desc: If the property Polar is set, then the first value specifies the radius and the second parameter the angle of the handle.
Otherwise, if the handle is not polar, the first parameter specifies the horizontal handle position, the vertical handle position is described by the second parameter.

properties.name: RadiusRangeMaximum
desc: If this attribute is set, it specifies the maximum radius range that can be used for a polar handle.

properties.name: RadiusRangeMinimum
desc: If this attribute is set, it specifies the minimum radius range that can be used for a polar handle.

properties.name: RangeXMaximum
desc: If the attribute RangeXMaximum is set, it specifies the horizontal maximum range of the handle.

properties.name: RangeXMinimum
desc: If the attribute RangeXMinimum is set, it specifies the horizontal minimum range of the handle.

properties.name: RangeYMaximum
desc: If the attribute RangeYMaximum is set, it specifies the vertical maximum range of the handle.

properties.name: RangeYMinimum
desc: If the attribute RangeYMinimum is set, it specifies the vertical minimum range of the handle.

properties.name: RefAngle
desc: RefAngle, if this attribute is set, it specifies the index of the adjustment value which is connected to the angle of the handle.

properties.name: RefR
desc: RefR, if this attribute is set, it specifies the index of the adjustment value which is connected to the radius of the handle.

properties.name: RefX
desc: RefX, if this attribute is set, it specifies the index of the adjustment value which is connected to the horizontal position of the handle.

properties.name: RefY
desc: RefY, if this attribute is set, it specifies the index of the adjustment value which is connected to the vertical position of the handle.

properties.name: Switched
desc: Specifies if the handle directions are swapped if the shape is taller than wide.
